titleStmt.title: The knowledge of things vnkowne Apperteyning to astronomy, wyth necessary rules, and certayne speares contayned in the same. Compyled by Godfridus super palladium de agricultura Anglicatum.
This booke of astronomye
titleStmt.author: Godfridus.

titleStmt.title: The knowledge of things vnkowne Apperteyning to astronomy, wyth necessary rules, and certayne speares contayned in the same. Compyled by Godfridus super palladium de agricultura Anglicatum.
This booke of astronomye
titleStmt.author: Godfridus.
Palladius, Rutilius Taurus Aemilianus. De re rustica.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreete, beneath the Conduit, at the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist, by H. Iackson,

notesStmt.note: An edition, with additions, of: This booke of astronomye.
Running title reads: The booke of knowledge.
"The additions include sections on bones, veins, and a rutter of distances between ports."--STC.
Connection with the "De re rustica" of Palladius is unclear, as are Godfridus's identity and the early history of this text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
